channel.title: The Sweetheart, The Romantic and The Bereft
channel.description:
# The Sweetheart **Neutral Killer** **Shared Room(Passive)** - You may speak with the Romantic at Night **Mourning(Passive)** - If the Romantic dies you will become the Bereft **Sweet Kiss(Day)** - The Romantic is immune to death tonight - 2 Uses **Kill with a Kiss(Night)** - Kill a player - 1-Night Cooldown - Cannot be used if the Romantic is using **Crime of Passion** **Woo(Night)** - Occupy a player - 2 Uses
# The Romantic **Neutral Killer** **Shared Room(Passive)** - You may speak with the Sweetheart at Night **Mourning(Passive)** - If the Sweetheart dies you will become the Bereft **Romantic Embrace(Day)** - The Sweetheart is immune to death tonight - 2 Uses **Crime of Passion(Night)** - Kill a player - 1-Night Cooldown - Cannot be used if the Sweetheart is using **Kill with a Kiss** **Court(Night)** - Make a player visit you unknowingly - 2 Uses
# The Bereft **Neutral Killer** **Grief-Stricken(Passive)** - You are too sad to be killed at night **Sharpen Knives(Day)** - **Cold-Blooded Murder** will pierce immunity tonight - 2 Uses **Cold-Blooded Murder(Night)** - Kill a player - Infinite Uses **Vengeance(Night)** - Kill the player who killed your lover(attacks a random voter if executed) - 1 Use

item.title: The Sweetheart, The Romantic and The Bereft
item.dc:creator: Rogue
item.description:
Expect a big post reviewing this :3 You review mine so I shall do the same back.

Read full topic
item.source: The Sweetheart, The Romantic and The Bereft

item.title: The Sweetheart, The Romantic and The Bereft
item.dc:creator: Unknown
item.description:
JammySplodge:

considering it’s a neutral Killer i didn’t think i needed to specify

well but they are two, and they are acting like a team… until one of them dies. so it’s not clear who wins if The Bereft kills all enemies- the Bereft only, or also the killed lover.

Read full topic

item.title: The Sweetheart, The Romantic and The Bereft
item.dc:creator: Insanity
item.description:
JammySplodge:

Vengeance(Night) - Kill the player who killed your lover(attacks a random voter if executed) - 1 Use

JammySplodge:

Sharpen Knives(Day) - Vengeance will pierce immunity tonight - 2 Uses

Why does it have 1 use when Sharpen Knife have 2 use?

Read full topic
